I ended up with a massive headache tonight. I think it was the heat though. It was in the high 90's with a heat index of 105 today. I use to get heat headaches as a kid, it has been a long time since I had one. No fun. BlazerFan: we started the same day! Only 32 more to go!! There was no one there before or after me. :( But the nurses are great! I have been using 2 different hospitals (rads is closer to home so different hospital) and everyone I have met has been amazing! I am so thankful for great nurses and drs.
